amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide, by $7,463,000 and increases funding for Fisher House Foundation, Inc., by $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide, by $7,463,000 and increase funding for Fisher House Foundation, Inc., by $5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Delaney amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Delaney amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Delaney.
